summary: Test suite that validates the Stable Cascade image generation pipelines (combined, decoder, prior) using lightweight dummy components. It verifies inference correctness, mixedâ€‘precision handling, batch processing, model offloading, callbacks, prompt and image embeddings, attention slicing, LoRA adapters, and deterministic behavior across devices.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of Stable Cascade pipelines for image generation, enabling robust development, integration, and deployment of the model in production environments.
